title: baNNisi gOpi
sahitya:
baNNisi gOpi harasidaLu


anupallavi

  eNNeyanottuta yadukula tilakake


caraNam 1    AyuSyavantanAgu ati ballitanAgu mAyada khaLara mardananAgu 
rAyara pAlisu rakkasara sOlisu vAyusutage nInoDeyanAgenuta
    caraNam 2    dhIranu nInAgu acyuta nInAgu dAnavAntakanAgu dayavAgu 
shrInivAsanAgu shrInidhi nInAgu jnAni purandara viTTalAgenuta
